name: One Spear, One Kill
description:
Welcome to the arena good hunter!

One Spear, One Kill is an ultimate arena shooter with very unusual gameplay as you play as a huntress, who is fighting with monsters in the arena. And she uses only one spear which she knows how to throw it very well. 

------------------------------------------

The goal in the game is to survive as long as possible using only one weapon - a spear. Which you can only throw into your enemies and each time you do this, you lose it and should get the spear back yourself.

------------------------------------------

Controls:

- WASD for movement;

- LMB for shooting (hold to charge);

------------------------------------------

Unfortunately, I didn't have any time and power to work on sounds. As a result, the game doesn't have any sound. However, I hope you will enjoy the game.

------------------------------------------

Art by 0x72, you can download it here.
